name: getproducts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_and_compate_products_allover_the_web.
Tool description: With our eCommerce products API you can easily search for products by name and retrieve newly added items from the last X days, among other features.
API description: Search for products by name and retrieve newly added items from the last X days, among other features.

query.description: The search query for the products.

country.description: The country code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'countryUS'.

location.description: The location to filter the search results. Defaults to 'us'.

lang.description: The language code to filter the search results. Defaults to 'en'.

period.description: The period in days to filter newly added items. Defaults to None.
